attributes.action: Lets get a Roundabout at Drayton Hall Lane, Dereham.
attributes.additional_details:
This junction on the A47 in Dereham is an accident hotspot, there are nearly weekly accidents here and it is unacceptable.
Many people have been killed or injured here.
I'm positive that the cost of installing a roundabout has to be less than the multiple call outs to the emergency services.
THe junction is used daily by families traveling to and from school.
